publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1131 Maureen Macmillan: Congratulations on the Building of the New Dawn-That the Parliament congratulates John MacLennan, John Leckie, Mark Dunley, Ian Gwyn, Thomas Taylor and Gary Hynde, all recovering heroin addicts, who built a Ness Yoal, the New Dawn, and launched it on 27 March 2004 at Invergordon, and further congratulates Colin Beattie who supervised the building of the boat, with the help of the Galgael Trust in Govan and Alness Mothers Against Drugs who set up the project with National Lottery funding and New Futures money from Highlands and Islands Enterprise.
S2M-1131 Congratulations on the Building of the New Dawn (lodged on 31 March 2004) Alex Neil*
